content.text: Web development is a broad field that involves creating websites and web applications. In this article, we'll introduce you to the basics of HTML, CSS, and web development.
HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard language for creating web pages. Below is an example of a simple HTML structure.

This is a Heading

This is a paragraph.

content.text: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to control the look and feel of your web pages. Here's how you can change the color of text.

questions.question: What is HTML?
questions.answer: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language and is used to create web pages.

questions.question: How do I change the style of my webpage?
questions.answer: You can use CSS to style your webpage by changing elements like color, size, and layout.
